examples: They have a gorgeous old oak tree in their front yard.
Tienen un hermoso roble viejo en su patio delantero.
My next-door neighbor was watering her yard.
Mi vecina de al lado estaba regando su jardín.
The prisoners were made to line up in the prison yard.
Los prisioneros fueron obligados a hacer fila en el patio de la prisión.
The children were playing in the yard at the front of the school.
Los niños jugaban en el patio al frente de la escuela.
